title: Dan Smith, professional tattoo artist and Sharpshock
itunes:title: Dan Smith, professional tattoo artist and Sharpshock
description:
One afternoon I had the pleasure of speaking with tattoo artist Dan Smith about his many life experiences including his stint on reality TV, coming to the US and playing in hardcore and punk bands in Australia/New Zealand. We spoke at his shop Captured Tattoo in Tustin, CA which is an amazing place if you are ever in the Southern California area, you must visit. A very lively chat and one I won't soon forget. Please donate to the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
